column4: does anyone know of a ppa or other deb repository for recent or nightly e17/efl releases?
you can use gconf to fix your issue
pop open a terminal, run gconf-editor
i'm telling you how to fix your issue...
i know how to fix your issue... open a terminal and run gconf-editor
click on the 'apps' folder, then scroll down and find the 'update-notifier' folder and click on that.  then on the right there is a checkbox that says "auto_launch" uncheck that box, and you're done
did a window pop up when you ran gconf-editor?
click on the 'apps' folder, then scroll down and find the 'update-notifier' folder and click on that.  then on the right there is a checkbox that says "auto_launch" uncheck that box, and you're done
too much work, cant be bothered. ty anyway :)
